synopsis: The fourth installment of the Universal Soldier franchise reunites action legends Jean-Claude Van Dammeand Dolph Lundgren. Surviving Unisols Luc Deveraux (Van Damme) and Andrew Scott (Lundgren) battle anarchy to build a new order ruled by Unisols without government oversight. To accomplish this, they weed out the weak and constantly test their strongest warriors in brutal, life-and-death combat.
title: Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning 3D
